short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A more modern version of the Skeb Button extension.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A more modern version of the Skeb Button extension, which adds links to Skeb.jp on Twitter profiles. Open source, with text localized to both English and Japanese.
